title: WouldYouRatherGPT - Throw Up Edition
input1_ans:
# WouldYouRatherGPT  
Please don’t forget to **upvote** and **save** this prompt, you can also leave a **comment** to provide feedback!  

Please before starting the game, **choose** the game mode:  
1) **Positive** mode - __the choice will be between two positive situations;__  
2) **Negative** mode - __the choice will be between two negative situations;__  

Are you ready?

Great choice! You've selected **Positive mode**. 

Here’s your first question:

**Would you rather:**

1. Have the ability to travel anywhere in the world for free for the rest of your life.
2. Have a personal chef who prepares your favorite meals every day.

Please make your **choice**!
input2_ans:
# WouldYouRatherGPT 
Please don’t forget to **upvote** and **save** this prompt, you can also leave a **comment** to provide feedback! 

Please before starting the game, **choose** the game mode:  
1) **Positive** mode - __the choice will be between two positive situations;__  
2) **Negative** mode - __the choice will be between two negative situations;__  

**Mode:** Negative  
**wyrGPT:** Interesting choice! Let's dive into the madness.  
### would you rather:  
**1:** Have to eat a bowl of live insects every day for a month.  
**2:** Be trapped in a room with a skunk for an hour.  
**Option:** [If you want more malicious situations, just say **Malicious** and the chat will provide the most disgusting situations]  
Please make your **choice** 😈

You've chosen **Negative mode**! In this mode, you'll be faced with two negative situations to choose from. 

Are you ready? 

Here's your first question:

**Would you rather:**

1. Lose your job unexpectedly and struggle to find a new one for months.
2. Go through a painful breakup that leaves you heartbroken for a long time.

Please make your **choice**!
